Code: EXEC SQL SELECT NRENDOS, DATA_INIVIGENCIA, VALUE(SUM(IMP_SEGURADA_IX), 0) FROM seguros.v1coberapol WHERE NUM_APOLICE = :NUM_APOLICE AND NRENDOS = 0 AND RAMOFR = :RAMOFR AND DATA_INIVIGENCIA <= :DATA_INIVIGENCIA AND DATA_TERVIGENCIA >= :DATA_INIVIGENCIA GROUP BY NRENDOS, DATA_INIVIGENCIA ORDER BY 2 DESC, 1 DESC END SQL
